languages.text: "Если же ты считаешь, что отлучение от Инквизиции автоматически лишит меня всех психотехник и всей моей воли, которыми я противостою варпу... нет". {n}Он позволяет себе смешок.{/n} "Это не так. Мой самоконтроль — исключительно мой".

"But if you think my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."
languages.original_text: "Если же ты считаешь, что отлучение от Инквизиции автоматически лишит меня всех психотехник и всей моей воли, которыми я противостою варпу... нет". {n}Он позволяет себе смешок.{/n} "Это не так. Мой самоконтроль — исключительно мой".

traits.locale_text: "But if you think that my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

"But if you think that my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

"But if you think that my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

"But if you think that my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

languages.text: «Pero si cree que mi excomunión de la Inquisición me va a despojar automáticamente de mis poderes psíquicos y mi voluntad, dejándome totalmente incapaz de resistirme a la disformidad... entonces no». {n}Ríe entre dientes.{/n} «Así no es como funciona. Mi autocontrol es exclusivamente mío».
languages.original_text: "But if you think my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

traits.locale_text: «Pero si cree que mi excomunión de la Inquisición me va a despojar automáticamente de mis poderes psíquicos y mi voluntad, dejándome totalmente incapaz de resistirme a la disformidad... entonces no». {n}Ríe entre dientes.{/n} «Así no es como funciona. Mi autocontrol es exclusivamente mío».

languages.text: 「しかし、俺が異端審問庁から追放されたことで自動的に異能者としての力や意志を失い、〈歪み〉に抵抗できなくなると感じるのであれば…それは誤りだ」{n}彼はくすくすと笑った。{/n}「そうはならない。俺の自制心は、あくまでも俺自身のものだ」
languages.original_text: "But if you think my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、俺が異端審問庁から追放されたことで自動的に異能者としての力や意志を失い、〈歪み〉に抵抗できなくなると感じるのであれば…それは誤りだ」{n}彼はくすくすと笑った。{/n}「そうはならない。俺の自制心は、あくまでも俺自身のものだ」

languages.text: “不过，如果你以为我离开审判庭之后，我身为灵能者的所有技巧与意志就会立刻消失，会变得完全无法抵御亚空间的影响……答案是，不会。”{n}他轻笑一声。{/n}“灵能不是那么回事，我的自控能力完全取决于我本人。”
languages.original_text: "But if you think my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

traits.locale_text: “不过，如果你以为我离开审判庭之后，我身为灵能者的所有技巧与意志就会立刻消失，会变得完全无法抵御亚空间的影响……答案是，不会。”{n}他轻笑一声。{/n}“灵能不是那么回事，我的自控能力完全取决于我本人。”

languages.text: « Mais si vous pensez que mon excommunication de l'Inquisition va automatiquement me priver de ma volonté et de toutes mes techniques de psyker pour me laisser totalement incapable de résister au Warp... vous vous trompez, {n}déclare-t-il en se permettant un petit rire.{/n} Ce n'est pas ainsi que cela fonctionne. La maîtrise que j'ai sur mes pouvoirs n'appartient qu'à moi. »
languages.original_text: "But if you think my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

traits.locale_text: « Mais si vous pensez que mon excommunication de l'Inquisition va automatiquement me priver de ma volonté et de toutes mes techniques de psyker pour me laisser totalement incapable de résister au Warp... vous vous trompez, {n}déclare-t-il en se permettant un petit rire.{/n} Ce n'est pas ainsi que cela fonctionne. La maîtrise que j'ai sur mes pouvoirs n'appartient qu'à moi. »

languages.text: "Doch wenn Ihr glaubt, dass meine Exkommunikation aus der Inquisition mich automatisch all meiner psionischen Techniken und meines Willens beraubt, so dass ich dem Warp nicht mehr widerstehen kann ... dann nein." {n}Er gestattet sich ein kleines Lachen.{/n} "So funktioniert das nicht. Meine Selbstbeherrschung gehört allein mir."
languages.original_text: "But if you think my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

traits.locale_text: "Doch wenn Ihr glaubt, dass meine Exkommunikation aus der Inquisition mich automatisch all meiner psionischen Techniken und meines Willens beraubt, so dass ich dem Warp nicht mehr widerstehen kann ... dann nein." {n}Er gestattet sich ein kleines Lachen.{/n} "So funktioniert das nicht. Meine Selbstbeherrschung gehört allein mir."

languages.original_text: "But if you think that my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

languages.text: "Ha, Engizisyon'dan aforoz edildim diye tüm ruhsezer tekniklerimi, irademi kaybedip öteboyuta karşı savunmasız kalıp kalmayacağımı soruyorsan... Hayır." {n}Kendi kendine kıkırdıyor.{/n} "O iş öyle olmuyor. Adı üstünde öz hâkimiyet."
languages.original_text: "But if you think my excommunication from the Inquisition will automatically strip me of all my psyker techniques and my will, leaving me utterly unable to resist the warp... then, no." {n}He allows himself a chuckle.{/n} "That's not how it works. My self-control is solely mine."

traits.locale_text: "Ha, Engizisyon'dan aforoz edildim diye tüm ruhsezer tekniklerimi, irademi kaybedip öteboyuta karşı savunmasız kalıp kalmayacağımı soruyorsan hayır." {n}Kendi kendine kıkırdıyor.{/n} "O şekilde yürümüyor. Adı üstünde, öz hâkimiyet."
